Israel shows its hard resentment about Bundeswehr wish to get part in peacekeeping operation in Lebanon. And main Israelites argument is that Germans will enter the territory of Israel with weapons in their hands! Israel officials can't to allow Germans to keep an eye on Jews nation and army again! 
 IMHO all those accusations in anti-Semitism and Holocaust oblivion are attempts to make everything to get Germans refusal from taking part in peacekeeping operation in Lebanon. I think that the in fact this is so called revenge for the truth Germany Mass media dared to make widely known. Look, as I know Mass Media in Germany is sole information outlet which has reflected how it really is in the current events in Near East. It's criticizing disproportionate and abundantly cruel methods of Israel in Lebanon. That's why Jews are so worried about it, they afraid that something special could come to light, some tests of new weapons or their use of bacteriological weapons for example.

What new and/or bacteriological weapons are you talking about?
 
 Are you alleging Israel has been using these ? If so have you any evidence ? and (not you heard from some-one who heard from some-one else etc)
